results.name: a(n) = n-th prime modulo 12.
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (Sage) [mod(p, 12) for p in primes(500)] # _Bruno Berselli_, May 05 2014
(MAGMA) [p mod(12): p in PrimesUpTo(500)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 06 2014
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
